title: I cant play anymore because of??
body:
So i was outside doing things and when i came inside i started my comp
there was some windows updates and now i cant play league i have no clue whats happening can anyone help?

replies.body: I'd like to help you out but I need some more details here.  Can you be more specific about the issue like where it's happening and what you're seeing?  Are you receiving any errors?  Let me know!

Hi, I had a similar thing happen and at a similar time so I can try to add some details. 

I had no problems running league previously. I had just installed a major windows 10 update and got through champ select without a problem. Immediately on entering the loading screen, a youtube video I was watching started to stutter and around 5 seconds later , I alt-tabbed into the loading screen and my entire laptop froze completely and I was hearing a repeated clicking sound. I powered off the laptop manually. I restated my laptop very quickly and got back to the loading screen. This time, I made it into the game and saw that the in game time was 1:30. However, after 1 second of getting into the game, my laptop froze again and I heard another repeated clicking sound and my laptop was completely unresponsive so I powered it off again manually. I haven't attempted to start another game or reconnect to that one. I checked the name of the latest windows update and it is called: "Security Update for Microsoft Windows (KB3176495). I am now in the process of running the login client as admin and attempting the repair available there. I'm not sure where to find the logs you might need but if you message me back with some instructions I can provide those too for you. Finally, I can just uninstall the latest update and I'm sure league would again work fine, but I would prefer to keep it, so I hope I can find a way to make both work.
Ok I had an issue like this, I clicked the ? on the launcher and launched the game as Admin and cleared something and the game started working just fine for me
